programme.title: Backwards
programme.desc: Inspired by true events. The story of a young mother of an autistic boy, whose many years of stubbornness and the fight against bureaucracy and human heartlessness led to changes in the education system.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: Hunting Season
programme.desc: Enersto, a hunting guide in Patagonia, is left to take care of his teenage son he hasn’t seen for years. An intense father-son relationship is played out amidst the hostility of nature.

programme.title: Murder in Sainte Baume
programme.desc: Carel has returned to his native Provence. With his ex-schoolmate, today head of the local police, he investigates the death of a man killed by dozens of bee stings. Soon they uncover a horrific case from the past, one that had shaken the whole village.

programme.title: Blind Dates
programme.desc: Sandro, a middle-aged bachelor, seems to find little success with online dating. Everything changes when he meets and falls in love with Manana. However, it turns out she is married and her husband is just about to be released from jail…

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: When photographer Marlene's son Jason faces a life-altering skateboarding accident, their journey to healing takes unexpected turns. As they travel from Berlin to Switzerland, Jason slowly convinces his mother that life takes detours.

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: Hippocrates
programme.desc: Benjamin dreams of being a great doctor, but his internship at his father’s ward doesn’t turn out the way he hoped. His experience as a junior doctor, with its overwhelming responsibility and stiff competition, forces him to confront his limits and fears.

programme.title: Murder In Luberon
programme.desc: A middle-age hunter is found murdered while on a hunting trip. While digging for clues, detectives excavate startling information about his private life. He was a serial seducer and master manipulator with dirty family secrets.

programme.title: Backwards
programme.desc: Inspired by true events. The story of a young mother of an autistic boy, whose many years of stubbornness and the fight against bureaucracy and human heartlessness led to changes in the education system.

programme.title: Hunters On A White Field
programme.desc: Deep in the Swedish woods, three friends go on an extended weekend hunting trip. After an initial spell of success, the animals suddenly vanish without a trace. Despite being in a forest without animals, the men decide that the hunt must continue.

programme.title: 15 Years
programme.desc: After being wrongfully imprisoned for 15 years, piano prodigy Jenny meets Syrian refugee Omar and agrees to accompany him on a talent show. There, Jenny faces the man who framed her and her ex, and she must choose between vengeance and happiness.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Jealousy
programme.desc: Inspector Bruhl is investigating the abduction of a young boy from a playground, until evidence suggests that the boy doesn’t exist at all. Is he a figment of the alleged mother’s fractured reality, or are answers buried in her traumatic past?

programme.title: Nick-Off Duty
programme.desc: When Lenny sets off on a mission to avenge her mother’s murder, she finds herself in trouble with the Russian mob and an underground organ harvesting ring. Her father, Hamburg cop Nick and his partner must race against the clock to rescue her.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: When photographer Marlene's son Jason faces a life-altering skateboarding accident, their journey to healing takes unexpected turns. As they travel from Berlin to Switzerland, Jason slowly convinces his mother that life takes detours.

programme.title: Kuma
programme.desc: After being tricked into becoming the second wife of a Turkish man in Vienna, the naïve Ayse accepts her fate and even develops a close friendship with Fatma, the first wife. With Fatma dying of cancer, Ayse has to take over her marital duties.

programme.title: Murder In Luberon
programme.desc: A middle-age hunter is found murdered while on a hunting trip. While digging for clues, detectives excavate startling information about his private life. He was a serial seducer and master manipulator with dirty family secrets.

programme.title: Hunters On A White Field
programme.desc: Deep in the Swedish woods, three friends go on an extended weekend hunting trip. After an initial spell of success, the animals suddenly vanish without a trace. Despite being in a forest without animals, the men decide that the hunt must continue.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Jealousy
programme.desc: Inspector Bruhl is investigating the abduction of a young boy from a playground, until evidence suggests that the boy doesn’t exist at all. Is he a figment of the alleged mother’s fractured reality, or are answers buried in her traumatic past?

programme.title: The Breach
programme.desc: A fatal car crash shudders a crisis-torn family. Completely lost and shaken to the core by his wife’s death, the husband undertakes his own investigation and learns the shattering truth about his spouse’s genuine woes and longings.

programme.title: 15 Years
programme.desc: After being wrongfully imprisoned for 15 years, piano prodigy Jenny meets Syrian refugee Omar and agrees to accompany him on a talent show. There, Jenny faces the man who framed her and her ex, and she must choose between vengeance and happiness.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Nick-Off Duty
programme.desc: When Lenny sets off on a mission to avenge her mother’s murder, she finds herself in trouble with the Russian mob and an underground organ harvesting ring. Her father, Hamburg cop Nick and his partner must race against the clock to rescue her.

programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.
